subject: Nordic Combined (Winter Sport Event)
Alpine Skiing
Skiing
Ski Jumping
lead_paragraph: Gregor Schlierenzauer broke the Granasen hill record in Trondheim, Norway, with a jump of 140 meters (459 feet 4 inches) in the first round and held on to win the World Cup ski jumping meet. Schlierenzauer finished with 285.7 points. Ville Larinto of Finland was second with 278.9 points.
